remarks: Express composition of a maps-to function with another function in a maps-to notation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
cofmpt.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : C --> D ) $.
cofmpt.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) $.
cofmpt $p |- ( ph -> ( F o. ( x e. A |-> B ) ) = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
